name: MinuteLongDisaster
description:
This is my submisson for the "One Minute Jam".

The game is entirely based around a conversation so the player only needs to click buttons. There are multiple endings, about seven, however, there are some variants, making for about twelve different routes. Each route is dynamically timed to only take roughly a minute (Some are a couple seconds longer or shorter).

Hope you enjoy :)

(As a side note: This jam was really fun, especially the design stage. I ended up creating an entire tool to help me with making the routes. Here's a screenshot of the finished dialogue tree, if you're interested: https://imgur.com/a/MCLLgg0)
